title: Kotuwa Boot Disc (KBD) MultiTask, MultiPurpose DVD
description:
Kotuwa Boot Disc (KBD) MultiTask, MultiPurpose DVD 
================================================== 

A Multi-Purpose, Multi-Tasking DVD... A Collection of Boot CDs (integrated :) 
Do Many Things from a Single DVD... 3.96 GiB. ISO. Disc Image. 
Surf Internet, Play Media Files, Copy Files and Folders, Data Recovery, Disk,Partition Cloning/Imaging - Backup/Restore, Virus Scanning, Networking Tools, System Tools + 
++ Many More :) 

- <a href="
http://i.imgur.com/tFNZovi" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">

Burn the disc image (ISO) into a DVD to use as a bootable disc. 
Before burning you can mount or explore the contents... 
Also you can test the boot process using virtual machines :)
